elementSpec.desc: in a bibliographic reference, contains the name of the author(s), personal or corporate, of a work; the primary statement of responsibility for any bibliographic item.

dans une référence bibliographique contient le nom de la (ou des) personne(s) physique(s) ou collectivité(s), auteur(s) d'une oeuvre ; la première mention de responsabilité pour tout object bibliographique
en una referencia bibliográfica, contiene el nombre del autor/es, personal o empresa de una obra; la declaración esencial de responsabilidad para cualquier ítem bibliográfico.
在書目參照中，包含一件作品的作者(群)姓名，無論是個人或是團體性質；這也是書目項目責任歸屬的主要陳述。
in un riferimento bibliografico contiene il nome dell'autore (o degli autori), personale o collettivo, di un'opera; è la dichiarazione di responsabilità primaria di ciascuna unità bibliografica.
書誌情報における，著作者の名前．第一位の責任者を示す．

egXML.author: British Broadcasting Corporation
La Fayette, Marie Madeleine Pioche de la Vergne, comtesse de (1634–1693)

remarks.p: Particularly where cataloguing is likely to be based on the content of the header, it is advisable to use generally recognized authority lists for the exact form of personal names.
In the case of a broadcast, use this element for the name of the company or network which broadcasts the program.
